abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column recounts experience of breast cancer pathologist Dr Kimberly Allison, who was herself diagnosed with the disease.
snippet: Dr. Kimberly Allison, a breast cancer pathologist, says her own struggle with the disease was “a really powerful experience” that helped her find inner strength.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Kimberly Allison, a breast cancer pathologist, says her own struggle with the disease was “a really powerful experience” that helped her find inner strength.

headline.main: For a Doctor, Survival and Transformation
headline.print_headline: For a Doctor, Survival and Transformation
headline.seo: A Doctor’s Story of Breast Cancer Survival and Transformation
